entry.title: â€œBoredom and the Bibleâ€ - Digital Disconnect (DID210012)

media:group.media:title: â€œBoredom and the Bibleâ€ - Digital Disconnect (DID210012)
media:group.media:description:
Pleasure-seeking and the quest for more entertainment put the brain into what scientists call 'the pleasure trap' - boredom and unhappiness as a result of indulgence in addictive behaviors. How can we escape the pleasure trap?

entry.title: â€œBody and Soulâ€œ 3ABN Today Bible Q & A (TDYQA210020)

media:group.media:title: â€œBody and Soulâ€œ 3ABN Today Bible Q & A (TDYQA210020)
media:group.media:description:
What does the Bible mean when it mentions a soul? And what did Jesus mean when He said we should not fear "those who kill the body but cannot kill the soul." But rather "Him who is able to destroy both soul and body in hell" (Matthew 10:28)? Get answers to this questionâ€”and many moreâ€”on 3ABN Today's Bible Q & A with Jason Bradley, Jill Morikone, John Lomacang, and John Dinzey straight from Godâ€™s word.
Send us your Bible Questions! By email: BibleQA@3abn.org By text: (618) 228-3975
TDYQA210020 #Bibletopics

entry.title: (SDA Sermon) Knowing the Truth is Not Sufficient | Pastor Ryan Day

media:group.media:title: (SDA Sermon) Knowing the Truth is Not Sufficient | Pastor Ryan Day
media:group.media:description:
In this sermon produced by 3ABN, Pastor Ryan Day will share from the Bible how deception is a key issue in our church today. Yes, even the Seventh-day Adventist church. Jesus told us it would happen. Unfortunately knowing the truth is not sufficient. So who's wrong and who's right?
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
